vietnam.title: Vietnam Adventure
vietnam.description: Ha Noi – Water puppet show – Ha Long Bay (day cruise) – Da Nang – Marble Mountain – Bana Hills – Hoi An old town – Lantern Boat – Ho Chi Minh – Mekong Delta. Experience Vietnam's 1000 years history and great natural wonders.

hero.title: Vietnam Adventure
hero.subtitle: 7 Nights / 8 Days
hero.description: Ha Noi – Water puppet show – Ha Long Bay (day cruise) – Da Nang – Marble Mountain – Bana Hills – Hoi An old town – Lantern Boat – Ho Chi Minh – Mekong Delta. Experience Vietnam's 1000 years history and great natural wonders.

overview.destinations: Hanoi, Ha Long Bay, Da Nang, Hoi An & Ho Chi Minh City

itinerary.title: Hanoi Arrival – Half Day City Tour
activities: Pick up from Noi Bai International Airport
Evening visit to Hanoi's charming Old Quarter
Try Vietnamese local food (pho, banh mi)

itinerary.title: Hanoi – Ha Long Bay Day Cruise – Hanoi
activities: Luxury Symphony Day Cruise with 2 Jacuzzi Pool
Visit floating villages and small beaches
Lunch on board with Vietnamese seafood

itinerary.title: Hanoi Full Day City Tour – Water Puppet Show
activities: Ba Dinh Square & Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum
Ho Chi Minh's house on stilts & Museum
Hoan Kiem Lake with Ngoc Son Temple

itinerary.title: Hanoi Departure – Da Nang Arrival – Marble Mountain
activities: Morning flight to Da Nang city
Free time at My Khe Beach
Evening stroll at Dragon Bridge with fire show

itinerary.title: Full Day Bana Hills – Hoi An Old Town – Lantern Boat
activities: Cable car to Ba Na Hills (world record holder)
Visit Linh Ung Pagoda & French Village
Hoi An old town walking tour
Lantern boat along Thu Bon river

itinerary.title: Da Nang Departure – Ho Chi Minh Arrival – Half Day City
activities: Morning flight to Ho Chi Minh City
Explore rooftop bars with city views

itinerary.title: Ho Chi Minh – Mekong Delta – Ho Chi Minh
activities: Visit My Tho, capital of Tien Giang Province
Coconut candy and bee farms tour

itinerary.title: Free Day – Ho Chi Minh Departure
activities: Free time for last minute shopping
Transfer to Tan Son Nhat Airport

dubai.title: Dubai Luxury
dubai.description: Experience the glamour of Dubai with luxury shopping, world-class dining, stunning architecture, and desert adventures. Discover the perfect blend of modern luxury and traditional Arabian culture.
